backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access‑controlled user profiles, thread CRUD, and event storage with admin checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product requirements to frontend files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file's purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and layout tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell loading the React app entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup with admin‑gated routes, theme provider, and global UI components.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminGate.t: Component that checks authentication/admin status and conditionally renders children or a fallback.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting authenticated users to create a profile if one does not exist, with save flow.
frontend/src/components/layout/AdminLayo: Provides an admin UI layout with navigation, user info, and logout handling, including a mobile drawer menu.
frontend/src/components/screens/AccessDe: Displays an access denied message and prompts unauthenticated users to sign in via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/threads/EventRow: Renders a single event with metadata, icons, formatted timestamp, and a delete confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/threads/ExportTh: Exports a thread and its events to a downloadable JSON file and shows success or error toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, loading, login, logout, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in React Query hooks for user profiles, threads, events, and mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes with shared styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
Renders a security guidance page with sections about token safety, chat ID retrieval, and data handling best practices.
frontend/src/pages/TelegramPanelPage.tsx: Provides UI for configuring the Telegram bot token and viewing basic polling status, including warnings about compromised tokens.
frontend/src/pages/ThreadDetailPage.tsx: Displays and manages a single thread, allowing editing, deleting, adding notes, and viewing associated events.
frontend/src/pages/ThreadsPage.tsx: Lists all threads with search, basic metadata display, and navigation to individual thread details.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling several plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project’s versioned state, goals, architectural constraints, known issues, and a list of existing features with their requirements and versions.
